ThingDef.label: chickenlodon egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: Unfertilized chickenlodon egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: chickenlodon egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: Fertilized chickenlodon egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. If all goes well, it should hatch into a chickenlodon.

ThingDef.label: mantistanis egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: Unfertilized mantistanis egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: mantistanis egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: Fertilized mantistanis egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. If all goes well, it should hatch into a mantistanis.
